channel.title: Lacking Natural Simplicity (Posts about tekumel: empire of the petal throne)

item.title: I got Tékumel: Empire of the Petal Throne!
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description: I got my copy of Guardians of Order's new roleplaying game, Tékumel: Empire of the Petal Throne. This is the first time since the original TSR Tékumel roleplaying game that there has been an edition of the game that was complete and playable in one book. While I haven't had time to read it completely I've skimmed through it and it looks very good.
item.category: tekumel: empire of the petal throne
